title: In Case You Missed…
text:
Main menu
To produce and publish these stories – and many more – costs money. And except for some book sales, we depend on the generous support of our readers.
So, please consider a tax-deductible donation either by credit card online or by mailing a check . (For readers wanting to use PayPal, you can address contributions to our PayPal Giving Fund account, which is named “The Consortium for Independent Journalism”).
Mark
July 20, 2017 at 01:24
I missed any mention of the third anniversary of the MH17 shoot down. But since Bellingcat posted something, maybe you could take an look and reply. https://www.bellingcat.com/news/uk-and-europe/2017/07/17/mh17-open-source-investigation-three-years-later/
Mulga Mumblebrain
Bellingcat is a Western ‘intelligence’ ‘asset’, of ZERO credibility.
cmack
